N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 461.13 - Accounting for other departments

State Regulations

This system of accounts is designed for use by steam
utilities. If the utility, in addition to its steam operations, operates other
departments, it shall keep such accounts for the other department as may be
prescribed by this commission, and in the absence of prescribed accounts, it
shall keep such accounts as are proper or necessary to reflect the results of
operating each such other department. It is not intended that proprietary and
similar accounts which apply to the utility as a whole shall be
departmentalized. (See also section
461.2
[g]
of this

Part.)
